description: This Amendment is entered into the between [ENTER NAME] and [ENTER NAME] and amends any existing agreement ot our service Terms in accordance with the requirements of the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679).
name: Amendment

description: [ENTER DATA CONTROLLER] shall ensure that any person who is authorised by [ENTER DATA CONTROLLER] to process Personal Data (including its staff, agents and subcontractors) shall be under an appropriate obligation of confidentiality (whether a contractual or statutory duty).
name: Confidentiality Agreement

description:
1. All warranties, conditions, and other terms implied by statue or common law are, to the fullest extent permitted by law, excluded from this Agreement.
2. Nothing in this Agreement limits or excludes the liability of [ENTER NAME A] for:
(a) death or personal injury resulting from its negligence; or
(b) fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation.
3. Subject to clause 1 and clause 2:
(a) [ENTER NAME A] shall not under any circumstances whatever be liable for:
i. loss of profits; or
ii. any special, indirect or consequential loss, costs, damages, charges, or expenses; and
(b) [ENTER NAME A]'s total liability in contract, tor (including negligence or breach of statutory duty), misrepresentation, restitution, or otherwise arising in connection with the perfomance or contemplated perfomance of this Agreement shall in all circumstances be limited to [AMOUNT].
name: Limitation of Liability
